0.1.name: wordpress/wordpress-friends-feed
0.1.description:
Wordpress Friends Posts in Single Page

LiveJournal is a quite popular blogging platform and one of main features that make it so popular is a "friends". You can add people as friends to your account and read their posts in a single page - /friends/. A lot of bloggers still use LiveJournal and do not move to standalone just because WordPress have no such feature.

Famous LiveJournal feature in WordPress But now this plugin allows you to do this. Add a people as friends and read their posts in your blog's page.

Our services: RFID | Cloud | Qt
